Detailed Description

This structure holds information about a device and its capabilities.

Use ep_radar_base_get_device_info to query the device information. When the sensor board sends device information, a structure of this type is returned through the callback Callback_Device_Info_t.

Definition at line 155 of file EndpointRadarBase.h.

Field Documentation

◆ data_format

Rx_Data_Format_t data_format

If the device can acquire complex data, this indicates if real and imaginary part are interleaved or not.

Definition at line 195 of file EndpointRadarBase.h.

◆ description

const char* description

A pointer to a null terminated string holding a human readable description of the device.

Definition at line 157 of file EndpointRadarBase.h.

◆ interleaved_rx

uint8_t interleaved_rx

If this is 0, the radar data of multiple RX antennas is stored in consecutive data blocks, where each block holds data of one antenna. If this is non-zero, the radar data of multiple RX antennas is stored in one data block, where for each point in time the samples from all RX antennas are stored consecutively before the data of the next point in time follows.

Definition at line 181 of file EndpointRadarBase.h.
